sentences.en: Britain's new ambassador to Lebanon has presented his credentials to the President.
sentences.cn: 英国驻黎巴嫩的新任大使已将国书递交给总统。

sentences.en: Custodian of the brand values , credentials and maintain the'sanctity of the brand '.
sentences.cn: 维护公司的声誉,确保公司品牌的树立.

sentences.en: He has all the credentials for the job.
sentences.cn: 他做这项工作完全够格。

sentences.en: He has brought his membership credentials with him.
sentences.cn: 他的组织关系已经带来了.

sentences.en: He has long credentials of diplomatic service.
sentences.cn: 他的外交工作资历很深.

sentences.en: He presented his credentials to the President in his character as ambassador.
sentences.cn: 他以大使身份向总统递交国书.

sentences.en: Her academic credentials include an MA and a PhD.
sentences.cn: 她的学历是文学硕士和哲学博士。

sentences.en: Itwill supply those credentials just as nicely to your shopping - madteenager.
sentences.cn: 它也会乖乖地为您的疯狂购物的孩子自动填写信息.

sentences.en: Keyes had formidable credentials of achievement.
sentences.cn: 凯斯有过极其伟大的成功纪录.

sentences.en: On January 10 a gentleman arrived to see me at Downing Street with the highest credentials.
sentences.cn: 1月10日,有一位先生带着最高国书到唐宁街来见我.

sentences.en: Our flimsy journalists credentials rest on my few magzine pieces.
sentences.cn: 我们的不牢靠的记者证所依仗的就是我那几篇杂志上的文章.

sentences.en: Present your credentials when you apply for a position.
sentences.cn: 你申请工作时,要递交你的各种证件.

sentences.en: She has the perfect credentials for the job.
Strong skills on negotiation, service, presentation, and managerial credentials.
sentences.cn: 有较强的谈判 、 客服 、 表述和管理能力.

sentences.en: The commissioner presented his credentials to the State Department.
sentences.cn: 该委员向国务院递交了他的任职资格证书。

sentences.en: While some of his peers might quarrel with the title, his credentials remain impressive.
sentences.cn: 尽管他的一些同龄人也许并不认同这个称号，他的资历仍然令人钦佩不已。

words.tran_cn: [管理]证书；文凭；信任状（credential的复数）

phrases.tran_cn: 资格审查委员会；证件审核委员会

trans.tran_en: a letter or other document which proves your good character or your right to have a particular position

trans.tran_cn: 得到信用；授…以证书（credential的三单形式）
